altername_name: Muscle Ranking - Kinniku Banzuke Vol.2 - Aratanaru Genkai he no Chousen!
name: Kinniku Banzuke Vol. 2: Arata naru Genkai e no Chousen!
overview: Kinniku Banzuke (Muscle Ranking), an enormously popular program that aired weekly between 1995 and 2002, and Sasuke, a twice-a-year special that’s still going strong. The premise of Kinniku Banzuke, as reflected in several Muscle Park games, is simple. Competitors must knock down nine numbered plates of a target using various sports apparatus, including Frisbees, baseballs and darts. Participants on the show included top athletes and qualified amateurs. Events: Punch-Out 9 hoops Beach Flags the Gallon Throw 50M Backflip Spray hitter Game Maker Dead Man's Drop Long Shoot
